page.title: 03THE CHURCH OF SAINT QUIVOX
page.content: Dalmilling Church, part of the Old Parish Church at Auchincruive was built as a church extension project and was opened during 1953. Over the years it has become a very important part of St.Quivox Parish.As it is a church extension building,it is very well suited to cater for the many organisations connected with the church.These include{Young Women's {Group,Woman's Guild,Men's Club,Junior {and Senior Boys' Brigade,Brownies {and Girl Guides.} During the year there are services on Sunday mornings at 10.30a.m. Children who attend Sunday School are taught in the{Wilson Hall,}the latest addition to Dalmilling Church. In the twenty-two years since it has been in existence,this church is most certainly a busy and essential part of the community.
